query:
SELECT id, title, JSON_LENGTH(modules) as module_count, 
JSON_EXTRACT(modules, '$[1].title') as module2_title,
LENGTH(JSON_EXTRACT(modules, '$[1].content')) as module2_content_length
FROM courses 
WHERE id = 120001;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT id, title, JSON_LENGTH(modules) as module_count, 
JSON_EXTRACT(modules, '$[1].title') as module2_title,
LENGTH(JSON_EXTRACT(modules, '$[1].content')) as module2_content_length
FROM courses 
WHERE id = 120001;
